channel.title: History :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Changelog 6.1.0 (2024-08-02) Enhancements [feature][change] assetbuster: use asset buster for all resources #875 [feature] theme: sync to Hugo changes for PublishDate #872 [feature] theme: allow errorlevel override on page level #870 [feature] relref: provide shortcodes to lift certain restrictions #864 [feature] openapi: adjust to Hugo’s build-in link render hook #860 [feature][change] include: adjust to Hugo’s build-in link render hook #859 Fixes [bug] variant: auto variant references potentially wrong chroma style #873 [bug] schema: sync to Hugo changes for LanguageCode #866 [bug] taxonomy: simplify code #852 [bug] alias: index.
